channel.title: Whats wrong with my paths or runserver?
channel.description:
CLASSPATH= [b]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%; [/b]
PATH=[b]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin [/b]
are my path set because my runserver bat says
[b] 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .[/b]
beacuse server won't run

item.title: Whats wrong with my paths or runserver?

can u give me a java download thats not new so it can be regonized[br][size=1]Posted on: October 09, 2007, 10:07:25 AM[/size][hr]is it jdk update or ju6?
